== Usage ==

== Values ==

== Elements ==

You can use the `vspace` attribute on the following elements:

  * [AppletElement <applet>]
  * [EmbedElement <embed>]
  * [IframeElement <iframe>]
  * [ImgElement <img>]
  * [MarqueeElement <marquee>]
  * [ObjectElement <object>]
  * [TableElement <table>]
